description: Empirical model for AFM1 degradation efficiency (%) as function of curcumin (mg/L), temperature (°C), and exposure time (hours).

validation.source_summary: Parameters derived as an interpretable fit to ranges reported in curcumin-assisted photodegradation literature (AFB1/AFM1 experimental dose ranges). This is a deployable empirical model; replace with retrained ML model when available.
